reviewText: My dad enjoyed them, 88 years and cant physically do much.  He cried a lot because its like 20 years ago and a lot of the singers have died and he enjoyed seeing them sing again.
If one misses hearing the old hymns, then I recommend these DVDs.
Love the Gaithers. I have been listening to them since I was a kid.
I enjoy the gaithers a lot and i bought this for my mum who also has been very blessed by their hymns.
The DVDs are great quality, lots of singing...being used at my mother's nursing home for all the residents to watch and listen to.  They love them!
